metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Talk to Civilian - S_LOW_CountingHouse_Civilian_05 1a31eecd-72c4-48ce-bdda-a8dd291352f7 - (-105; 10; -230)

0.speaker: Brialavant
0.text: If you cannot get the coin you need here, try for a room at the Elfsong. Alan has plenty of space in his upper floors.

1.speaker: Brialavant
1.text: If Alan is out of rooms... well, the Church of Last Hope has shut down ahead of the army's arrival. A bad joke, that.
